document.full_text: iranian security forces killed four members of "extreme religious groups" who were behind deadly attacks in the western restive province of kurdistan, the semi-official mehr news agency reported friday.
document.title: iran kills four militants in west: agency report
lines_and_colors: iranian security forces killed four members of "extreme religious groups" who were behind deadly attacks in the western restive province of kurdistan, the semi-official mehr news agency reported friday.
